alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 6:13AM PST until January 07 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM PST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest to north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
